attributes.action: Prohibit all vans and trucks from the third/outside lane of all motorways in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A large majority of accidents on motorways involves a van of some sort. Although they can travel as fast as a car, following drivers cannot see past them, and leaving a sufficient gap only invites others to squeeze in front of you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
